channel.title: Putting a command into the game?
channel.description:
Can someone make me a guide or something that tells me where to put my command into what file.
:)

item.title: Putting a command into the game?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

ok use this command thingy lol (i dont know how to do the box thing)

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“comand”))
{
addItem(item id,value);
addItem(item id,value);
addItem(item id,value);
addItem(item id,value);
addItem(item id,value);
addItem(item id,value);
addItem(item id,value);
addItem(item id,value);
sendMessage(“Put text here to allow player to see”);
sendMessage(“Type in ::command to do this again”);
}

If you don’t want it to send message just delete it but make sure you don’t delete }
